Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following unauthorized person on the tracks at 69th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following unauthorized person on the tracks at 69th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
